[h1]Update v2.0:[/h1] v2.0 - [spoiler]C# implemented, Operations are sequential and require ingredients, white hair, witcher swords, and more.[/spoiler]
[h1]Introduction[/h1] This mod allows you to research the ancient Witcher trials and perform the procedures on your pawns. You are able to research:[list] [*] The Trial of the Grasses: The first trial. The body is manipulated with herbs, toxins and poisons. This primarily affects the nervous system. [*] The Trial of the Dreams: The second trial. The mutation of the eyes, hormones and bone marrow is performed. [*] The Trial of the Elders: The final trial. Forgotton practices were once performed on the witchers. You too can uncover these secrets, and pay the price.[/list]
[h1]Good questions so far:[/h1][list] [*]I have a big modlist, are there any compatability issues? - I sincerely doubt it, my mod only adds. [*]Can I use this on a running savegame? - Knock yourself out, will be fine. Uninstalling is a different matter. [*]When I apply a new Trial, the old one disappears? - This is expected behaviour. Its easier to calculate the balance of the mod when only one Trial is being applied to the stats. [/list]
[h1]Anticipated questions:[/h1][list] [*]Q: My hair isnt white?! - A: [spoiler]Keep going.[/spoiler] [*]Q: These ingredients are unrealistic!/The research takes too long!/The costs are too damn high! A: [spoiler]Honestly? Witchers are overpowered, think of witchers as implanting every bionic. Now do you get it?[/spoiler] [/list]
[h1]UNINSTALLING THIS MOD:[/h1][olist] [*] Enable Dev Mode. (BUT I PERMANENTLY DISABLED IT!? - you've just learnt a valuable lesson.) [*] Use 'Destroy' to delete any items made by my mod. [*] Use 'Remove Hediff...' to disable the Trials bonuses on your affect pawns. [*] Save your game, exit rimworld.[/olist] Your save should now be clean.
Feedback encouraged.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active.
